segments.text: Good morning , sir . Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to have a suit made to measure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . How would you like your suit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One Made in 100 % black Barathea wool , with 5 Celtic buttons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine . You can get it 6 days later .
segments.speaker: S1
